game.name: Sprint City
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, 레이싱, 스포츠, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Sprint City is a shared world, competitive 2D platformer from the original creators of SpeedRunners. It’s all about fast movement, tight controls, and the constant fear that someone behind you just found a shortcut you didn’t know about.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sprint City is a shared world, competitive 2D platformer from the original creators of SpeedRunners. It’s all about fast movement, tight controls, and the constant fear that someone behind you just found a shortcut you didn’t know about.
